授業目的: Refer to the following.
授業方法:
In addition to lecture-style classes, active learning will be conducted through group work, pair work, and other activities.
Class announcements will be made through LUNA notifications when necessary.
As this is a flipped classroom, students are required to prepare in advance.

第1回:
Orientation
Reading the article of World Heritage
Read World Heritage Convention and understand the significance
第2回: Unit9 A Tragic Masquerade: The Royal Palace of Drottningholm (Sweden

Preparation of Text P47-51
Gathering information about World Heritage Sites regarding the title

Unit10   Underground Towns: Goreme National Park and the Rock Sites of  
Cappadocia (Turkey)

第13回: Preparation for presentation of world heritage sites you are interested
